title: may 25: the murder of George Floyd
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the murder of George Floyd in 2020, which sparked nationwide protests in the name of justice for George and Black Lives Matter. After, she reflects on the soundtrack of Star Wars. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
